channel.title: Omg!
channel.description:
how and where do i change home? So if i click on home tele it tele me to edgeville
Now it teleports met to falador
I want edgeville has home
and how do i put shops in a other place?
PI BASED!

item.title: Omg!
item.dc:creator: @xocean xocean
item.description:
@xocean wrote:

src/server/Config.java

Example

public static final int START_LOCATION_X = 3094; // Start Point X public static final int START_LOCATION_Y = 3472; // Start Point Y
Change the respawn location too.?

public static final int RESPAWN_X = 3094; // Respawn Point X public static final int RESPAWN_Y = 3472; // Respawn Point YThese are coords for edgevilliage if you want to use them.
-Change the coords to your desired ones if you dont like mine

deleter164:

To change the home teleport do ::mypos on the stop where it teles u for home…then search the x coordinate in clicking most.java and u can change the coordinates to anywhere ud like…i hope this helps

What? if you change the coords in config.java the home teleport should already be set to teleport to home.

Example
this is in clickingbuttons.java

//home teleports case 4171: case 50056: String type = c.playerMagicBook == 0 ? "modern" : "ancient"; c.getPA().startTeleport(Config.START_LOCATION_X+Misc.random(2), Config.START_LOCATION_Y+Misc.random(2), 0, type); break;

Read full topic

item.title: Omg!
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

Go to Edgeville and do ::mypos, it will tell you your coordinates, look for the coordinates in your player class and change them from Faladors coordinates to Edgeville.

In shops.cfg change their coordinates to your desired ones.

Next time, keep the thread clean or there will be hell to pay.

Read full topic
